abstract: The $3.5 billion investment in Uber could put JPMorgan Chase and the law firm Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom in line for more big Saudi deals.
snippet: The $3.5 billion investment in Uber could put JPMorgan Chase and the law firm Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom in line for more big Saudi deals.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Saudi Arabia’s $3.5 billion bet on Uber is perhaps the biggest single investment in a start-up on record.

headline.main: Saudi Stake in Uber Lifts Advisory Companies to Prime Positions

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
